data.description: Send SMS messages through Clickatell service
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Clickatell.pm provides OO methods that allow to send SMS messages
    through the Clickatell paid service. This service provides many ways
    to send messages: HTTP,SMTP, SMPP,FTP, et cetera. At the moment
    Clickatell.pm only supports HTTP method, but in the near future, the
    submodules Clickatell::HTTP, Clickatell::SMTP, Clickatell::SMPP,
    Clickatell::FTP, and others will be developed.

    More info on http://www.clickatell.com/
